doc:
Simone Silva https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Simone_Silva 0 Simone Silva (15 August 1928 – 30 November 1957) was an Egyptian-born French film actress who appeared in a handful of British B-movies during the 1950s. Silva, who was once quoted as saying she would "do anything" to get in the newspapers, was known however less for her acting than for her voluptuous figure and shameless publicity-seeking activities. She briefly made global headlines following a notorious incident at the 1954 Cannes Film Festival where she posed topless with Robert Mitchum for photographers, causing a sensation when the photographs were flashed around the world. Simone_Silva ( 15_August_1928 – 30_November_1957 ) was an_Egyptian-born_French_film_actress who appeared in a_handful of British_B-movies during the_1950s . Silva , who was_once_quoted as saying she would " do anything " to_get in the_newspapers , was_known however_less for her_acting than for her_voluptuous_figure and shameless_publicity-seeking_activities . She briefly made global_headlines following a_notorious_incident at the_1954_Cannes_Film_Festival where she posed topless with Robert_Mitchum for photographers , causing a_sensation when the_photographs were_flashed around the_world .
